title: Bright, Renovated Apartment in the heart of Logan Square
posting_body: ['Completely renovated apartment ideally located in the heart of Logan Square (3251 W. Belden)', '* Hardwood floors throughout.', '* Renovated--newer electrical, plumbing, thermopane windows, etc.', '*', 'Large eat-in kitchen with pantry', '* Each bedroom can accommodate a queen-sized bed and has its own closet.', '* Bathroom has the original claw-footed bathtub.', '* Unit is located on the 1st floor.', '* Storage locker and laundry in basement.', '* Newer rear porches/deck.', '* Very well-maintained property.', 'Ideally located in the heart of Logan Square (3251 W. Belden)', '* Tree-lined, low-density street.', '* Good on-street parking.', '* 3/12 blocks to the Logan Square Blue Line EL stop.', '* 1 mile to the Fullerton entrance ramp of I-90/94.', '* Walking distance to all that Logan Square has to offer.', 'Lease terms:', '* $1200/month plus utilities.', '* One month security deposit.', '* One year lease.', '* Available 10/1.', '* Cats OK/No dogs.', '* Contact Bill @ 773-209-5033']
